direction.raw_text: because I don't want anything to happen to you. He glances up at her, and it's clear: he has affection for her. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He presses a tracking device into her hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If trouble comes, turn this on, no matter where, and I'll find you. 83   INT. SAFE HOUSE VAULT - NIGHT                                83 Raizo remains motionless, his eyes open when he hears someone coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't do that they'll catch you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then they'll catch me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll put you in the box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. They will. 84   FLASHBACK - INT. ORPHANAGE DORMITORY - NIGHT                 84 It is the middle of the night. Raizo lies on a floor mat, unable to sleep. He looks over at Kiriko's empty mat. Quietly he gets up and makes his way outside. 85   FLASHBACK - EXT. ORPHANAGE MEDITATION BOX - NIGHT            85 He moves to an upright bamboo box about the size of a coffin. Looking at -- -- Kiriko, in the box. Dehydration has left Kiriko with barely the strength to breathe. Her lips are swollen and cracked, she sags against the tight walls of the box. He pulls a bamboo straw from his dark robe, then fills his mouth with water from a flask. Sticking the straw through the bamboo poles near her lips, he feeds her drop by drop, and in this way, separated by a cage they share a kind of kiss. Her eyes part, ever so slightly, and she manages a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you.   I tried to warn you. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...yes, you did....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you did it anyway.   Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why am I in here for watering my tree...or why are you out there... watering me? She meets his eyes. 86   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - VAULT - NIGHT                              86 Mika is standing behind the bars which slide open. She has a bottle of water, she looks at the two armed guards following her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you give us a moment?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Negative.   Not safe ma'am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he wanted to hurt me he could have done that a while ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry ma'am. Maslow okayed the water. That's it. They stand near the door as Mika crosses to Raizo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi...you looked thirsty. She holds the water bottle to his lips, whispering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry...I didn't know about this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do? He nod's, swallowing another sip. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only time you lied to me was when you told me your size.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you know that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your heart.   It is special.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know about my heart?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hearts speak truer than tongues. He is unlike anyone she has ever met.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, Maslow is on our side. He's going to try to help you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's too late. All that matters is the Rihla. Get the manuscript before they get here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Hanta Kirra?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry. 87   INT. SAFE-HOUSE GROUND FLOOR - NIGHT                         87 Mika rushes up to Maslow who is talking to the group of Europols.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ryan, can I talk to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to do this again, Coretti?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No sir. I just...I have reason to believe that a group of ninja may be on their way here. The men chuckle. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think these gentlemen can handle a few whack-jobs wearing pajamas. Am I right? They ad-lib responses: Fucking' A sir... Locked, cocked and ready to rock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the situation we discussed-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm working on that. You have to give me a little time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't have time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're not here now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll be here soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How soon- 88   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - VAULT - NIGHT                               88 Raizo looks up.       His eyes narrow: they're here. 89   INT. SAFE-HOUSE GROUND FLOOR - NIGHT                          89 The lights go out. Mika's eyes dart into the pitch, red emergency lights suddenly glowing ominously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raizo-- Maslow spins as she sprints for the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika! Maslow draws his firearm and hisses at one of the Special Ops. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 6/4/08   71A. 89    CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go with her! Secure the prisoner! Instantly, tiny LED flashlights and laser targeting systems light up on automatic weapons. Night vision goggles go up. Rather than panicking, the police are instantly in stealth-mode, communicating with quick, urgent hand gestures. A handful of men splinter off for the vault while the rest separate into teams with practiced precision, moving through the safe-house, ready for whatever comes. 89A   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - VAULT - NIGHT                              89A Mika charges into the holding area, the detail of men right at her heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold your fire-- Raizo's guards release their aim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christ--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good way to get yourself killed, Agent Coretti.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck's with the lights?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got some guys in pajamas comin' to play spin the bottle. One of them lifts a shotgun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh huh. I got something they can wrap their lips around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have time for this shit. We have to move the prisoner. In the back of his cell, Raizo's head lifts at the sound of Mika's voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ma'am. Those aren't our orders. Raizo calls from behind the reinforced door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got to get out of here! She calls to his cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not without you. Raizo's voice hangs in the gloom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we all die together. 89B   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - GROUND FLOOR - NIGHT                    89B One of the teams edges through the decay of the dilapidated industrial cavern. Straining through the eyepiece of his goggles one of them mutters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't see shit-- Ahead the point man motions and the men take up defensive positions. The point man creeps forward, a flicker of heat fluttering in his IR-Optic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that..? Through the darkness we see that his infrared is actually picking up the slow exhale of a ninja poised like a cobra inches away just above him. His blades flash-- And the detail of men recoil as their infrared sensors light up, the point man cleft open in hot volcanic gore. A cloud of shuriken spit out of the darkness and punch into necks, faces, eyes. Ten of them fall like wheat before a scythe. The rest fire hitting nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 2nd DRAFT     6/4/08   71C. 90   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - VAULT - NIGHT                           90 The screams of dying men and gunfire shudder down the gullet of the old concrete building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck me... She watches as the men position themselves, pressing into the black of the corridor. Thumbs flick safeties to hot. A shriek pierces the silence, one of the agents suddenly jerked from his feet like a puppet on a string. They watch in IR as the agent falls to the ground in several pieces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fu-- #2's exclamation gets caught in the oozing slit that opens in his throat. The man guarding Raizo's cell door screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're not showing up on IR! He clicks his flashlight the beam glinting against a hail of shuriken that pound into him, wounds flowering in ribbons of red. Mika watches as he lands wetly at her feet. More screams and gunfire shake the shock from her. She dives for the guard, frantic fingers clawing at the key-chain clipped to his belt. The remaining Europol Agents cluster together, flashlights strobing spastically, while Mika slams through Raizo's cell door. She instantly goes to work on his leg irons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on--come on-- Raizo's eyes narrow, the last of the Europol Agents butchered by shadows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to sound critical-- He can feel the rush of darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it! The leg irons click open and Raizo springs forward the chain of his handcuffs catching a falling blade. He twists and the ring of metal on metal is followed by the dry snap of bone as Raizo breaks the ninja's neck. She releases his handcuffs and they move quickly through the glistening remains of the bodies, Raizo shielding her from the darkness. 90A   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - SUBLEVEL - NIGHT                           90A The two sprint from a stairwell into a concourse, Raizo stopping suddenly, sensing the presence of the Hanta- Kirra. He pushes her toward another set of stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go. Find Maslow. He turns to facing the dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go quick. She lurches up the stairs as the Hanta-Kirra descend on him like a murder of crows. 90B   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - STAIRWELL - NIGHT                          90B Mika flies up the stairs taking the steps two at a time rounding the next flight-- A beam of light flashing weapons rattling suddenly trained on her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika! Her stomach finds its way into her throat. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Ryan-- Maslow rushes down to her, another agent scanning the stairs above them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you were-- Mika's eyes widen as the agent on the flight above them is ripped into the air replaced by a squall of red. Maslow whirls as a blade suddenly pierces his side-- But before it can continue its deadly cut, Maslow catches it in a bloody fist and fires into the shadows. One of the Hanta-Kirra falls tumbling past them down the stairs. Maslow grunts as he rips the chain blade from his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you ok? He nods, a bit woozy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope that wasn't my liver. Gonna need that soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. 91    INT. SAFE-HOUSE - GROUND FLOOR                             91 Sparks dance along the singing ringing blades, the melee escalating in the darkness. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sparks fly and blood falls. This is the first time we've seen Raizo turned loose. But it's three on one...and Takeshi isn't a pushover. Mika and Maslow slam through the exit into-- 92   INT. GARAGE - NIGHT                                        92 The building carpark.    Mika suddenly stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The manuscript--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No Mika-- He is about to argue but wilts at her resolve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right... He stuffs his car keys in her hand, trying not to let his voice crack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two minutes.    Keep it in gear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maslow-- He turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tip-toe. He opens the door retracing their steps into the dark. Mika suddenly very alone manages a slow nervous pirouette in the crypt-like garage, before skittering for Maslow's sedan. She slides in pulling the door shut behind her as quietly as she can-- And waits. 93   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - GROUND FLOOR - NIGHT                        93 Maslow moves cautiously through the folds of midnight. He hears the fighting before he can see it. Raizo blocks a sword-thrust from Takeshi. Dodges around a hail of shuriken. Uses his chain to drive another Ninja back. Takeshi rips free his left arm. Draws a short, angled blade and brings it slashing down at Raizo's neck... Raizo blocks the knife with his elbow, twists, throws Takeshi twenty feet through the air. He recovers mid- flight like a cat and regains his balance. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Ryan... A figure darts in her periphery and her head whips around craning all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry the fuck up! Ka-chunk-- she punches the lock. Click-- the headlights flash on-- Ka-chick-- she chambers the Glock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Motherfuckfuckfuck-- She twists the ignition and as the motor turns over-- The car's headlights explode, shattered by projectiles that seem to materialize from the void. Mika screams throwing the car into gear-- Peeling out toward the down ramp. The car fishtails down level after level through the oscillating light/dark of the dimly lit exit ramp. Her eyes twitch from mirror to mirror when she sees up ahead-- A shadow hanging in the corner of the tunnel like a spider. She ducks just as the front of the sedan is shredded by a squall of stars. The sedan rebounds into the light. Its hood and windscreen looking as though it was gnawed on by a Great White. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ryan- I had to leave!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, stay clear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have the map?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet.   We're heading upstairs now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Raizo (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He took off.   We think they went after him. He looks into the surrounding shadows unsure. 96   EXT. ROOFTOPS - NIGHT                                         96 Raizo parkours across the roofs, the Hanta Kirra close behind. Shuriken sizzle past; some missing, some lashing open whip cuts across his flesh. 97   EXT. WINGED VICTORY ROUNDABOUT - NIGHT                        97 Raizo pulls free the shuriken in his side. Drops them to the ground where they clatter back and forth like so much tossed change. He looks up at winged victory silhouetted against the moonlight. And suddenly the ninja are on him. Raizo blocks and parries. Counterattacks with a reverse cut - and throws himself sideways as a truck comes roaring down at him. The truck fills the screen with lights and horns and three tons of death. Raizo cartwheels over the hood, forcing the Scarred Ninja to leap the other way, and as he turns -- -- Raizo comes down on him, slashing his shoulder. 98   EXT. WINGED VICTORY ROUNDABOUT - NIGHT - CONTINUOUS           98 The fight is now two one against one, and one of them is Takeshi. Their swords crash back and forth, sending sparks flying. Raizo is tired, already wounded by the shuriken... With a cry, he hurls a second Ninja back and spins to face Takeshi... Too late. Takeshi's blade gets under his guard.       Opens up Raizo's side. His sword is ripped free from his hand, rebounds off a speeding sedan and clatters to the ground thirty feet away. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raizo stumbles backward. Life's blood dripping down and splattering on the concrete. Takeshi raises his sword high.       Smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the end for you, brother. Mika's car slashes across the width of the street screeching to a stop next to Raizo. The door snaps open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raizo! Raizo gets into the car. Collapses into the seat, arms wrapped tight around the ugly wound in his side. She peels away before the others can stop her. Mika carves a path through the traffic, driving as fast as she can. Eager to get more miles between them and the ninjas. Raizo lets out a gasp as the car goes over a bump.        His shirt is drenched with his own blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you doing in the street?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...waiting for you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to go to a hospital.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Not a hospital.     Another place. The car speeds into the night. 99   EXT. HERBALIST - NIGHT                                          99 The sort of store where the owner lives above the shop. Mika pounds on the door as a LIGHT comes on in the floor above. A moment later, the door opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?   What -- He steps out of the way as Mika helps Raizo in, bloody and half-dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Herbalist places herbs into a hand-grinder as Raizo staggers through the rows of bowls, grabbing what he needs and handing it to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...dong-xia leaves...three of the lo-chan...dragon root...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should not mix these.    Very dangerous. Raizo ignores him. Gives her some more dried bits and pieces. The herbalist shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you are in pain...if you wish to die...there are other ways, this will be agony -- RAIZO No...it will save me....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It will?  You're sure? (beat) Let me write this down. He goes to find a pen and paper as Mika grinds away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hot water. She goes to a tea kettle, pours water into the bowl.   He reaches for it, and nearly collapses. She helps him raise the cup to his lips. Tilts it and watches him drink. Takes the empty cup away from him. Raizo shudders as the drugs course through him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to sleep now...a day at least. His eyelids flutter.    She's holding him up now - muscles already loosening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A day?!?     What should I do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...keep moving... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He slumps over the counter like a child dropping into deepest sleep as -- -- the herbalist comes back, pen and paper in hand. He pauses as he sees Mika standing over Raizo. She looks from him to Raizo and back again, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll have him to go. (beat) Can you...help me to the car?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 101   EXT. AUTOBAHN - NIGHT                                         101 Mika is the proverbial bat outta hell. Her phone is at her ear. INTERCUT WITH: 102   INT. SAFE-HOUSE - NIGHT                                       102 The lights are back on but the place is trashed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika, where are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving.   He told me to keep moving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's still alive? She glances at his slumped body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After a fashion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let us bring you in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika, the situation's a little different. Jurisprudence goes out the fucking window when my men get attacked. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have the manuscript? He takes a breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...negative. They got to my office. Everything's gone. The news crushes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika, it's gonna be all right. We'll find them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...but I promised...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll keep your promise. They're too many people involved now. It's just a matter of time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think we have much time...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just tell me where you are. She hangs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika? Mika? Dammit. 103   EXT. HIGHWAY MOTEL PARKING LOT - NIGHT                      103 The car is parked outside the same hotel that he took her too. 104   INT. HIGHWAY MOTEL ROOM/BATHROOM - NIGHT                    104 She steps out of the shower and dries herself with an evergreen branch. 105   INT. HIGHWAY MOTEL ROOM - NIGHT                             105 In the bedroom, Raizo is sprawled out on the bed. She is wearing new clothes. She takes a drag on a cigarette then passes the smoke over her body. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know you can't hear me, so I'm sure this doesn't matter, but I'm going to say it anyway. She looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a forensic researcher, okay? That's like a fancy way of saying I'm a librarian. By myself I can't do anything to help you. She opens her fist; inside is the tracking device Maslow gave her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to think you for saving my life. Bending over him, she kisses him gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I hope you can forgive me for this. 106   INT. MASLOW'S OFFICE - NIGHT                               106 There's a crowd of other OFFICIALS there, having turned the place into a makeshift command and control center. An AIDE rushes in from an adjoining room, goes to Maslow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agent Maslow, the tracking device--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got a lock?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Triangulating her position now. 107   EXT. HIGHWAY MOTEL ACROSS PARKING LOT - NIGHT              107 Mika watches from the trees as a shadow comes to life on the balcony outside their room. It pauses as if sensing something. 108   INT. HIGHWAY MOTEL ROOM - NIGHT                            108 Raizo lies alone. The heavy shadows begin to undulate as the Hanta-Kirra emerge. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 6/4/08   83. 108   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Takeshi's eyes gleam the way a blade gleams. 109   EXT. HIGHWAY MOTEL PARKING LOT - DAWN                        109 Police and Europol cars scream up to the hotel. 110   EXT/INT. HIGHWAY MOTEL ROOM - DAWN                           110 A moment later the door bursts open; Maslow and his men pour into the bedroom. The bed is empty. Raizo is gone. Mika is sitting in the chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They took him.     Ten minutes ago. He's gone. Maslow embraces her. 111   FLASHBACK - INT ORPHANAGE DORMITORY - NIGHT                  111 There is a furious storm raging outside       the thin screened walls. Raizo is watching Kiriko who seems to be sleeping. In a flash of lightning, her eyes open and she stares at him and he feels in hi heart what she is saying goodbye. The flashing ends and as the thunder booms, she is gone, melting quietly into the shadows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...no! 112   EXT. ORPHANAGE COURTYARD/WALL - NIGHT                        112 Two shadows race through sheets of rain, visible in flashes of lightning. He catches her near the base of the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kiriko!   You can't leave!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because my heart is telling me too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Hanta Kirra will come for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then they will come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know the law. He will cut your heart from your chest. She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...He can never touch my heart. She puts his hand on her chest, then leans in and kisses him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where? What is out there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Life. He cannot imagine what that life might be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...My life is here. She bows her head and turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you doing this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I can't watch you become something you are not. She races for the wall. He watches her climb...And disappear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raizo drifts on the edge of consciousness. He can sense some light filtering through the edges and air holes. The air begins to smell familiar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have been betrayed. 114   FLASHBACK - EXT. ORPHANAGE COURTYARD - DAY              114 The clan is gathered outside, the sun beats down on the Spartan courtyard. Kiriko's body is twisted, bound to a pole like one of the Bonsai trees. Ozunu delivers his eulogy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A child of mine, my daughter, betrayed us. She refused these gifts. Rejected our clan. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raizo stands among the clan; his face a mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hers is a shame that can only be purged with blood. He unsheathes the ancient Wakizashi, then offers the hilt to Takeshi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You who returned her shall have this honor. Takeshi hides a smile as he takes the blade. Kiriko looks out into the clan and finds Raizo.      He can hear her heart pounding. Takeshi knows where she is looking as he prepares to strike. Blood pounds in Raizo's ears. The sword plunges into her heart.    Raizo hears it die- And feels his own heart stop. 115   INT. ORPHANAGE COURTYARD - NIGHT                           115 A bucket of water slaps Raizo awake. He's bound to a pole in the middle of the courtyard by thick rope that bites into his flesh. Ozunu stands before him, as well as the rest of the clan, down to the youngest of them. Watching silently. He looks the same as he has in the flashbacks - except that now an ugly scar runs diagonally across the length of his face. Trace of Raizo's blade from atop the building in Dubai. When he speaks, Ozunu is speaking for the benefit of the rest of the clan as to Raizo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are Ozunu. Your life is meaningless compared to the survival of the Clan. This is our deepest truth. Because of it, we have endured for hundreds of years, and will endure for hundreds more. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks to the rest, pounding the message home.       The message that says hope and escape are futile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weakness compels strength. Betrayal begets blood. This is the way of the Nine Clans. (beat) This is the way of the Ninja. He looks back at Raizo, approaching slowly.       Taking his time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have waited many years for this moment. I have dreamed it, many times. He hits Raizo.    Hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will suffer for seven days, one day for each year you defied me. He takes a knife, and very carefully cuts out a very small piece of Raizo's flesh, from the upper arm. Raizo doesn't cry out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For seven days, we will...take...from you, as I have just done. Everyone here will take from you. Piece by piece. You will live through it all, you will feel through it all. You will watch as the birds fight over the pieces. He STRIKES Raizo as he did long ago, his hand jutting deep inside gut, flicking switches of nerves that cause instant agony. This time Raizo does cry out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will know pain like no other human being has ever known. He twists something in Raizo's belly and violent spasms wrack the young man's body. Blood burbles up through his mouth and flows down his chin. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your death will be remembered for a thousand years as a testament to the will and strength of the Ozunu Clan. One last gouge in Raizo's stomach sends a heaving shudder through him. Confident, victorious, Ozunu turns and walks a few steps away as -- -- Raizo coughs up a bloody wad onto the clean floor. Takeshi smiles at this, then looks more closely, seeing something amidst the bile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father... Ozunu looks down and sees a tiny steel cylinder.    A single LED light blinking through the gore. He nudges it with his foot...and TIME SLOWS DOWN as he realizes what he's looking at. He slowly raises his eyes -- -- and meets Raizo's gaze as suddenly -- -- EXPLOSIONS rock the orphanage's centuries-old gate. A reinforced military Humvee crashes through the cloud of splintering timber with a roar and an explosion of blinding lights. The Ozunu Clan scatters as the massive vehicle heaves into the courtyard, revealing behind it still more vehicles, all equipped with brilliant lights. The ninjas take to the shadows, trying to melt away, but the shadows are gone. There's no place for the ninjas to hide anymore. We FIND Mika and Maslow in one of the lead vehicles as -- -- Takeshi draws his blade in a smooth arc, raising it over Raizo's helpless form. Maslow takes aim with his submachine gun and squeezes off a long burst. Takeshi blocks some of the slugs with his sword and dodges the others. He slides into one of the few remaining shadows. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of the soldiers sees him making a break for it and fires an incendiary grenade. The explosion sends incandescent white phosphorous splashing through the courtyard, but Takeshi is gone. They prepare to fire another one when Maslow comes on the run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more grenades, not until we get the children out! But some parts of the orphanage are already on fire, the flames spreading through the ancient timbers. The carnage continues. Maslow fires at the fleeing ninjas as Mika rushes for Raizo, pistol in hand. One of the MP's screams as a shuriken rips open his face as other Mps FIRE back at the ninja, tearing him apart with gunfire. Mika makes it to Raizo's side. He smiles at her as she saws through the rope with her knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What took you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew I'd come?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just because I was asleep doesn't mean I couldn't hear you. Mika finishes with the rope. Raizo pulls free and reaches for a fallen ninja's sword and chain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I forgive you. Mika looks back at the sound of GUNFIRE tearing apart another ninja. When she looks back -- -- Raizo is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fires are ripping through the interior, leaping from bamboo furniture to paper shoji screens to polished wooden floors as -- -- Raizo kicks down the burning wall of the empty dorm, the futons smoldering. Raizo continues into the next hall to find -- -- Takeshi waiting for him. An apparition in the wavering blaze of heat, silhouetted against a wall of fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come, little brother, let us play like old times They spring at other. Meeting in the middle of the hallway as the flames dance around them...recalling the lanterns they used to fight through, in the days of their training. Their weapons ring out a frenzied drum roll of steel on steel. Neither giving an inch. Evenly matched in skill and ferocity. Locking together for a moment Takeshi smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No death tasted as sweet as hers. Raizo's back glistens orange in the firelight, sweat pouring as he strains, attacks, defends and attacks again. Takeshi jumps over them, twists mid-air and ducks low beneath Raizo's swinging chain as -- -- Raizo stumbles back on the polished floor, blocking Takeshi's attack, but -- -- Takeshi catches his wrist in an iron grip. As he brings his sword around, Raizo gets a loop of chain around the blade and locks it tight. Both men spin in their sudden embrace.   Faces inches from each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I watched you die when I pierced her heart. You have always been too weak to be Ozunu. Takeshi's finger trips a hidden button on the sword. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The blade retracts back through the handle and a yard of steel jolts out from the hilt of Takeshi's sword. He moves to slam it into Raizo's side...but Raizo FLIPS over him, holding onto the hilt and as he lands he -- -- DRIVES the steel into Takeshi's heart. He still stands for a BEAT, more by inertia than will, then slumps, dead, to the floor. Raizo stalks down the hall.    One last task ahead of him. 117   INT. ORPHANAGE OZUNU HOUSE NIGHTINGALE FLOOR/MASTERS      117 ROOM/ASSEMBLY ROOM - NIGHT Raizo walks across the Nightingale floor, his bloody footprints moving soundlessly. From the shadows he hears Ozunu's voice
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have not forgotten your training. You will always be mine, child. Raizo stops, considers this, then continues; his footsteps now bringing every sound possible. Ozunu steps out of the darkness, as though shrugging off a cloak of midnight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps this is the best way for you to die. His blade rises as like a Cobra's hood, while the chain blade begins to spin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The breath I take after you are dead, will be the first of my life. Raizo unleashes all his fury: The chain cutting with the power of an enormous buzz saw-- Hacking timbers in half-- Carving scars in the floors and walls-- Braziers are thrown, fumes begin to spread but-- Ozunu blocks or evades, absorbing the assault patiently (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Waiting for Raizo to tire, waiting for an opening. 118   EXT. ORPHANAGE - COURTYARD - NIGHT                             118 A portion of the Orphanage's wall burns through.        Mika spots Raizo through the flames. She runs for him. 119   INT. ORPHANAGE OZUNU HOUSE ASSEMBLY ROOM - NIGHT               119 Raizo begins to weaken. An attack misses wrapping a beam and Ozunu has his opening- His assault is ferocious. Wounds begin opening like windows shears of blood billowing out. Raizo retreats, his chain just blocking, catching, or deflecting the whirlwind attack until-- One sound cuts through the furious fight. Snap-zoom to Ozunu's ear as-- The hammer is cocked, a cylinder spinning into place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Die you fuck! She fires and Ozunu twists enough so that the bullet grazes him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bitch! A scatter shot of shurikens send her diving to the floor. But the distraction gives Raizo his chance. The blade whistles, the chain snaps and blood arcs out of Ozunu. Rage thunders the hall. Mika gets back up and aims but-- Ozunu seems to pull the shadows and smoke around him as he disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raizo (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She cannot see him. Ozunu's attack hits Raizo with the force of a bomb burst, his blade shatters through Raizo's chain-- Hurling him back, petals of blood fluttering from his chest. Raizo tries to recover, his chain now in two pieces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika! Run!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is he?   I can't see him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get away! Ozunu emerges from the smoke behind her, a wraith. His eyes are as black as the sockets of a skull. She spins around but is too late. The ancient blade runs straight through her chest just as- - Raizo finds them. He sees Kiriko, the same blade taking her life and howls-- His pain a force of nature unleashed. The chain blades crackle in the air- Dual cyclones that batter Ozunu's parrying blade which- Finally shatters against Raizo's fury. And with a final scream, Raizo lunges at his master, the whistling blades lazering through his body until he separates, pieces hanging in mid-air, like an unstitched rag doll. Raizo throws down the blood slick blades and-- --hurries to Mika's side. He picks Mika up and walks through the falling timbers and blazing shards to the door. 120   EXT. ORPHANAGE COURTYARD - NIGHT                          120 The fighting is over now.     All the combatant ninjas dead or long gone. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maslow sees Raizo emerge from the smoke and flames, carrying Mika in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mika! He runs to her side as Raizo lays her gently on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She saved my life. Raizo puts his hand on her chest. Closes his eyes.          We can FEEL her heart-beat. Bump-thump. Bump-thump. Raizo opens his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She will be all right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you be sure? Raizo touches her face as she takes in a sudden breath. He smiles distantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her heart is special.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medic!    Over here now! Several medics rush to them, Raizo gently laying her on the stretcher. As they immediately begin working on her, Raizo fades back. Maslow remains at her side. Her eyes flutter open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is she going to be okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know...she's got a hole right through the middle of her heart...but shes not really bleeding, that badly... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My heart... She points to the right side of her chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...is over here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...you gotta be fucking kidding me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Raizo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said you saved his life. She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you kept your promise. Can we go home now? 121    EXT. ORPHANAGE BONSAI GARDEN - DAY                         121 Raizo stands among the bound trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't do that. 122    FLASHBACK - EXT ORPHANAGE BONSAI GARDEN - DAY              122 Kiriko releases one of the trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I believe the heart of a tree knows which way it needs to grow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 122A   Raizo releases a tree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trees don't have hearts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything has a heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 123 She listens to his heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello...hello in there. It said it was happy to meet me and that it missed you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 124   EXT. ORPHANAGE COURTYARD/WALL - DAY                          124 He stands and looks at the wall. 125   FLASHBACK - EXT ORPHANAGE COURTYARD/WALL - NIGHT             125 The storm lashes against them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come with me!
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Raizo meets the Hanta-Kirra in the air. Vaults from one wall and door to another, spinning in and out of view as he moves through the shadows. The ninjas move with him, matching his speed and ferocity and ability to disappear within the darkness. Swords clash against chains and sword and walls.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: From the darkness a ninja fires a dozen shuriken at him, and at least three of the spinning blades find their mark. Raizo grunts at the impact, but vaults up and over a counter and LEAPS through a window, crashing out to - 94   INT. GARAGE - NIGHT                                        94 The surrounding shadows seem to press in on the car.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mika cranks the wheel tearing around a dark bend as-- Toom! Something lands on the roof of the car. Above her she sees the distinct tips of the tiger claws that have punctured the metal exterior of the car just as- - She passes under a light-- Revealing a crouching ninja staring right at her, through the sun roof. His blade whips from its sheath but before he can strike-- She jams the barrel of the Glock between the two tips of one set of claws, right where his foot should be-- And fires. A scream is followed by a gout of blood that washes over the sunroof-- The ninja's body tumbling off the back of the car. Maslow's gnarled sedan bottoms out in a starburst of sparks as it corners into traffic. Mika breathing heavy digs into her bag for her cell phone. INTERCUT WITH: 95   INT. SAFE HOUSE - NIGHT                                     95 The lights are still dead. Maslow is with a team of Europols moving through the stairwell. He talks quietly.
dialogue.name: dialogue

location: ORPHANAGE OZUNU HOUSE NIGHTINGALE FLOOR/MASTERS 117 ROOM/ASSEMBLY ROOM
result.heading: INT.

dialogue.raw_text: 2nd DRAFT    6/4/08     95. 123   FLASHBACK - EXT: ORPHANAGE BONSAI GARDEN - DAY
dialogue.name: dialogue
